spanGrp.span: when he saw an antelope sleeping

u.seg: when he saw an antelope sleeping

spanGrp.span: he came on his horse at a place.

u.seg: he came on his horse at a place.
he breaks the saddle by beating it with repeated blows and

spanGrp.span: he breaks by beating repeated blows and
he kindles his fire, they said.

u.seg: he kindles his fire, they said.
he does not look for other wood .

spanGrp.span: He comes walking towards the antelope and

u.seg: He comes walking towards the antelope and

spanGrp.span: when he arrives at the antelope

u.seg: when he arrives at the antelope

spanGrp.span: he says and he takes, they said.

u.seg: he says and he takes it, they said.
It runs away from him, they said.

spanGrp.span: It runs away from him, they said.
